...that's a stupid feature.

topics.body:
Alright then. I just got done with Episode 1 of Nichijou.

It's still meh, even with all of the weirdness and random "dramatic" moments. I'm either barely chuckling, confused, sarcastic, or highly indifferent towards it.

And I'm only done with Episode 1. 
Out of 26.

MFW:
!http://i1245.photobucket.com/albums/gg593/reecegoble/fuuuu.jpg!

topics.body:
Man
Kind Piccolo is way more threatening in this cartoon than in that shitty movie


I had to think about the movie, now I'm just mad
